start.title: A New Start
start.text: You walk into your CS class with excitement and nerves.

confident.title: Your Voice Matters
confident.text: You talk about resilience, being an immigrant, and building space for others.

quiet.title: Listening First
quiet.text: You listen deeply. You realize growth isn't linear.

tech.title: Your Purpose
tech.text: You talk about building tools and games that empower people to learn, feel seen, and grow.

end.title: A Strong Start
end.text: You feel seen. The journey continues.
